name: Gravitys Pull Game Jam
description:
!HUGE DISCLAMER! This is my First Game Jam! 

I WAY over scoped my idea for this game Jam and then on top of that I did not get to work on it nearly as much as I wanted to. Things just came up so please don't judge me to harshly :D

This "Game" is really more of a playable idea of something I didn't get time to finish. In this game you have a pack that allows you to manipulate gravity's pull in three ways.

1. it allows you to get boosted upward, kind of like a burst jet pack

2. it allows you to shoot forwards with tons of speed.

3. You can use it to slam you down and bust through obstacles

You can do all three of these is this game and you'll go and explore this quickly put together world I made and collect dollars and quarters. I even made a collectable mask you can put on in the game cause pandemic lol. 

There is some hidden dudes in the level playing janky looking animations and three shrunk down dudes that are kind of hidden.

CONTROLS

Mouse and keyboard

WASD to move

SPACE to jump

G to switch "Gravity Abilities"

SPACE while in air to use "Gravity Abilities"

Press C While in air to use Gravity Smash

TAB to pause

Controller Controls

left thumb stick to move

A or X to jump

D-PAD Up to switch "Gravity Abilities"

A or X while in air to use "Gravity Abilities"

Right Thumb Stick Button while in air to use Gravity Smash

Pause Button? To Pause 

(May have forgotten to implement the controller pause key binding...) 

The Pack your guy wears has Three lights to indicate how much "Gravity Ability" you have left to use.

The jump boost uses one per boost (Represented By a Blue Glow)

The Forward Speed Boost takes all three (Represented By a Purple Glow)

The Gravity Slam used only two Points (Represented By a RED Glow)

Please enjoy, its not a whole lot just had some stuff come up with my work and family that just limited my time on this project, it was fun!

ps. The pause button is weird idk why its red didn't get time to look into it

p.p.s. Again this is rough again please don't judge too harshly simply just became a time crunch
